answers.answer: You could ask your dr for a test. Though it might just be the pregnancy.  Im 11w4d and im exhosted all of the time. I could cry, im so tired. I would sleep but I have 3 other kids and one of them is just a baby. Sooo tired.My sugestion enjoy the sleep while you can.

I do that too. I'm thirty weeks. It takes energy to break down food. To digest. And your already growing a baby. You can try smaller meals thru out the day. But I always feel like I'm constantly eating. So I just plan on a nap after meals. Just watch for the signs of gestational diabetes. You should be fine. Enjoy the naps, try not to feel too guilty about em... Lol
Nice to know its not just me I do the same thing after im done eating I feel I could sleep sitting up lol14 weeks ttomorrow

Thanks for all the posts. I feel better knowing it's not just me. I feel so bad i fall asleep every night promptly after we eat. It's crazy how exhausted I am but it does take a lot to grow a little person :)

You could try drinking a glass of water with some apple cider vinegar with mother a half hour prior to eating to prepare your stomache for digestion.  It is also a good energy drink if you mix some honey in it.

question: I am 15 weeks along. After I eat lunch I become extremely exhausted and after I eat dinner I pretty much pass out. Is this normal?  Should I be concerned about my blood sugar?
title: extreme exhaustion after eating?
